greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of psi(x)^2 - 5 * x * psi(x^5)^2 in powers of x where psi() is a Ramanujan theta function.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
reference: S. Cooper, On Ramanujan's function k(q)=r(q)r^2(q^2), Ramanujan J., 20 (2009), 311-328; see p. 314 eq. (2.7)
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2500
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Expansion of f(-x) * phi(-x) / chi(-x^5) in powers of x where phi(), chi(), f() are Ramanujan theta functions.
Expansion of q^(-1/4) * eta(q)^3 * eta(q^10) / (eta(q^2) * eta(q^5)) in powers of q.
G.f. is a period 1 Fourier series which satisfies f(-1 / (40 t)) = 10 (t/i) g(t) where q = exp(2 Pi i t) and g(t) is g.f. for A094247.
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QPochhammer[ x]^3 QPochhammer[ x^10] / (QPochhammer[ x^2] QPochhammer[ x^5]), {x, 0, n}]
a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ (EllipticTheta[ 2, 0, q^2]^2 - 5 EllipticTheta[ 2, 0, q^10]^2) / 4, {q, 0, 4 n + 1}]
program: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x + A)^3 * eta(x^10 + A) / (eta(x^2 + A) * eta(x^5 + A)), n))}
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jul 12 2012
